attributes.action: don't be green about green issues ! ask the major stationary companies and computer manufacturers to facilitate safe disposal of IT hardware
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The recycling of printer cartridges is one of the eco - friendly movement's greatest achievements - (and so are private initiatives like "Cash Converters" which allow the public to redistribute electrical goods), but these companies do not recycle computer equipment. 

What about an environmentally green policy with the major stationary companies and computer manufacturers to facilitate safe disposal of IT hardware ?

Society only learned about the dangers of putting fridges onto tips AFTER it was too late - the petitioner is calling on the P.M. to please stop an approaching eco - disaster and conduct a cost - benefit analysis of how the disposal of computer equipment can best be acheived.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
